author: senh
title: On Tobago, Mermen Come Calling
text: BING NEWS: On Tobago, Mermen Come Calling Flying into Tobago in July, I looked down on a wide swath of yellow seaweed rippling in the tideline. Sargassum. From the sky, its gentle, drifting movements belied the invasive algae’s destructive power.
